title: 2007년 Gonzalez 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Gonzalez. 판결일: 2007-09-20. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Jose Gonzalez
**판결일**: 2007-09-20
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 43 A.D.3d 722
- 841 N.Y.S.2d 444

## 판결문 요약


Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County (Bruce Allen, J.), rendered April 18, 2006, convicting defendant, after a jury trial, of assault in the first degree, and sentencing him to a term of eight years, unanimously affirmed.
By failing to object, by making only generalized objections, and by failing to request further relief after objections were sustained, defendant has failed to preserve his present challenges to the People’s cross-examination and summation, and we decline to review them in the interest of justice. Concur— Lippman, EJ., Mazzarelli, Sullivan, Nardelli and Sweeny, JJ.
...
